channel.title: Error connecting to server
channel.description: Okay guys, I'm having a really annoying problem. I've portforwarded correctly, I've edited the client's GUI and client.java so that it connects to my server, I connect through localhost however, but that really doesn't matter because I can connect either way. But the thing is, when my brother tries to connect to my server through my client, an error message shows saying "Error connecting to server". I can connect, but anyone else can't. How do I fix this? :confused:

item.title: Error connecting to server
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

Okay guys, I’m having a really annoying problem. I’ve portforwarded correctly, I’ve edited the client’s GUI and client.java so that it connects to my server, I connect through localhost however, but that really doesn’t matter because I can connect either way. But the thing is, when my brother tries to connect to my server through my client, an error message shows saying “Error connecting to server”. I can connect, but anyone else can’t. How do I fix this?

Read full topic
